mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Medicine, First Year Class, 1930-1931
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Class of 1934 Identified (L to R): First row: George Curtis Austin, Sullivan Gale Bedell, George Simmerman Bourne, John Newton Bowden, Louis H. Bress, Alexander Gustavus Brown, Harry Paul Browning, Charles Lorraine Cabell, George Robert Carpenter, Richard Reading Chamberlain, Hugh Tucker Chelf, Jr.,Walter Franklin Cole, Robert Nelson Cooley, William Clark Cooper Second row: Thomas Wallace Cox, Jr., Richard Earle DeButts, Margaret DeRonde, Julian Booth Doss, William Clegg Eversole, Joseph Romeo Gentile, Joseph Edward Gladstone, Howard Clarke Glover, Noble Maxwell Goodloe, John Bagby Haley, Walter Douglas Hankins, Harry H. Hardeen, George Alfred Hess, William Rollan Hill Third row: Howard Thompson Holden, Clara Lucille Hoye, Joseph Leigh Hundley, John Omohundro Hurt, William Allen Johns, William Virginius King, Jr., Israel Maurice Kruger, James F. Lane, Armando Joseph Lauritano, Lewis Littlepage, Jr., John Fulton McGavock, Brooke Baylor Mallory, James Calvin Martin, Lemuel Edward Mayo, Jr. Fourth row: William Perry Moore, Hugh Page Newbill, Charles Collins Orr, Lawrence Pace, Roy Glenn Parks, Roy Randolph Powell, William Gilmer Puryear, Mary Eleanor Rawls, John Walton Ross, Jr., Mack Irvin Shanholtz, James Robert Shanklin, Richard Vair Shanklin, Jr., Richard Henry Smith, Charles L. Stinson Fifth row: Harry Benjamin Stone, Jr., William Joshua Sturgis, Jr., Thomas William Tanner, John Hansford Thomas, Jr., William Edgar Waddell, Robert Fletcher Watson, Harvie Lincoln Williams, Fletcher Johnston Wright, Jr.
